ygData.subject: RE: Pally solo? (was Re: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns in Velious )
ygData.msgSnippet: Twice in one day. I ll ask again.  Did you read my post? Either way a spectre runs so slow that even when feared you can beat the crap out of them from
ygData.messageBody:
Twice in one day. I'll ask again.  Did you read my post?
 
"Either way a spectre runs so slow that even when feared you can beat the crap out of them from behind. "
 
Yes, go solo spectre. Even when feared in Oasis you can kill them without having to have snare/darkness.  If you dont want to have to worry about exploiting the bug pull them away from the ocean towards Orc Highway.
 
Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: Danspath [mailto:danspth@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2001 5:02 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: Pally solo? (was Re: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns in Velious )

Ya, er, so paladins can solo the undead if they exploit a bug? Or are there other valid methods? Just curious, I think now that everyone is an uber twink soloing for all hybrids is a bit more realistic.

  "Nygaardr, FC3" <nygaardr@...> wrote:



Its hardly my fault they stop running.  Actually everything stops when feared near this spot.  Either way a spectre runs so slow that even when feared you can beat the crap out of them from behind. 

 

Mu


-----Original Message-----
From: mferrulo@... [mailto:mferrulo@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2001 4:25 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Pally solo? (was Re: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns in Velious )

In a message dated 3/8/01 2:41:22 PM Eastern Standard Time,
nygaardr@... writes:



Oasis has a nice bugged spot where the mobs stop running and just stand
still.


People will receive a warning on their account for exploiting this Bug.  Some
guy had two warnings from other stupid acts and a GM caught him doing this
and he was banned.

Overall - Paladins are a terrible class for soloing.

Wiz
